column5: I need to know when the season opens? Can anyone tell me?Thanks a bunch

Needz to fish:Check out the following web site for the information you require:http://www.fapaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/index1.htmThat brings you to the english version of the Quebec Parks web site. Select regulations for 2001-2002 and get your information for the zone you will be fishing. Jay

I was up in Kipawa for the opening on May Friday may 18th. The pickerel was slow still to cold however they were starting to move. Lake trout were everywhere and the blackfies were deadly along with mosquitoes
